\begin{rSection}{Work Experience}
\textbf{Software Engineer} \hfill Feb 2024 - Present \\
\href{https://www.getkisi.com/}{Kisi Inc.\faExternalLink}  \textnormal{\textit{
Cloud-Based Security Platform} | C, C++, MQTT, lwIP, GCP, AWS IoT} \hfill
\textit{Brooklyn, New York}
\textnormal{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Owned transition and IoT cloud platform integration for fleet of \textbf{50,000} access control IoT devices to a new proprietary IoT platform.
        \item Developed support for inbound HTTP capabilities, contributing to network architecture redesign, for Microvisor (micro-controller hypervisor) running on STM32 \& FreeRTOS based firmware stack.
        \item Executed on development of an in-house IP stack, focusing on UDP protocol implementation using the lwIP \& mbedTLS library to support critical local network features such as offline cache and feedback systems.
        \item Provisioned Cloud Integration with GCP, designing a scalable server architecture using MQTT for continuous device-server communication, crucial for configuration management and security updates.
        \item Established secure communication protocols for the IoT device ecosystem, including data encryption and signature validation processes to uphold network and data integrity.
        % \item Conducted comprehensive \textbf{evaluation of AWS tools and capabilities}, orchestrating demos and developing a phased rollout plan for new hardware platforms.
        \item Collaborated on development of a comprehensive testing strategy and documentation, ensuring high coverage and maintainability of the system architecture and cloud integration solutions.
    \end{itemize}
}
\textbf{Fullstack Software Engineer Intern} \hfill Jul 2023 - Sep 2023 \\
\href{alpha.coditioning.com}{Coditioning \faExternalLink} \textnormal{\textit{EduTech Startup} |Python, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL} \hfill
\textit{Remote}
\textnormal{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Owned system design \& development of a code execution engine, tailored for Coditioning's e-learning platform.
        \item Designed a RESTful OpenAPI Schema for a Python-centric backend, laying down foundation for seamless code submission and retrieval, as well as historic data access.
        \item Devised a suite of intuitive API endpoints to empower frontend functionalities: code submissions, status verifications, result acquisitions, and past submission access.
        \item Overcame Heroku's 30-second response time constraints utilizing callback-enabled endpoints for clients to poll efficiently, averting timeouts and enhancing initial prototype's responsiveness.
    \end{itemize}
}
\textbf{DevOps Intern} \hfill May 2023 - Aug 2023 \\
\href{https://www.hydrax.io/
}{HydraX \faExternalLink }\textnormal{\textit{FinTech SaaS Startup} |TypeScript, Python, AWS, Kubernetes, Prometheus, Grafana, SQL} \hfill
\textit{Singapore}
\textnormal{
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Deployed \& implemented internal tools in Elastic Kubernetes Service, enabling cost analysis and optimization for the company's products, increasing granularity from cluster to container level.
        % \item Created custom Grafana dashboards using promQL for cost monitoring and reporting.
        \item Identified and handled duplication in log ingestion monitoring stack and reduced cloud storage costs in various clusters up to 39.8\%. 
        \item Migrated AWS resources to CDK in the infrastructure pipeline for private digital exchanges in development clusters, for increasing automation coverage of CI/CD pipeline.
        % \item Monitored security vulnerabilities for new test cluster images patching and upgrading deprecated packages.
        % \item Enhanced Grafana automation stack, integrating continuous deployment for versioned Grafana dashboards in new nodes, with promQL hooks.
    \end{itemize}
